title: Hoverbug
creator_credit: Fanfare Films, George H. Brown and Jan Darnley-Smith
brief_description: Young Dick and Jenny Brewster are trying to build a small hovercraft to enter into a race. Mr Watts, an eccentric inventor, offers his help. Charley Guthridge and his mate Sidney plot to prevent Dick and Jenny from building their home-made hovercraft. On the day of the big race, Dick and Jenny stuggle to take the lead and beat their opponents. Stars Jill Riddick; John Trayhorn; Francis Attard; Gary Cann; Arthur Howard; Michael Balfour; Jan Butlin; Peter Myers; Cardew Robinson; Michael Segal; Harold Goodwin; Marianne Stone; and Janet Waldron.
